    • Method Detail

      • generateMenuScreen

        protected int generateMenuScreen()
        The Food Menu Items Management Menu
        Specified by:
        generateMenuScreen in class BaseMenu
        Returns:
        Exit Code. Return 1 to exit the program and -1 to exit to main menu

      • printMenu

        public void printMenu()
        Prints the CSV File Menu. (uses the globally defined "menuItems" ArrayList from MainApp)

      • addNewMenuItem

        public void addNewMenuItem(String newItemName,
                           int newItemType,
                           String newItemDescription,
                           double newItemPrice)
        Method to add a new menu item. (uses "writeToCsv" to facilitate I/O operations from MenuItemCSVHelper.)
        Parameters:
        newItemName - Name of the new menu item to be added.
        newItemType - Type of the new menu item to be added. Can only be defined as the following enum values: DRINK, MAIN or DESSERT.
        newItemDescription - Description of the new menu item to be added.
        newItemPrice - Price of the new menu item to be added.

      • editMenuItem

        public void editMenuItem(int targetItemID,
                         String editItemName,
                         int editItemType,
                         String editItemDescription,
                         double editItemPrice)
        Method to edit an existing item. (uses "writeToCsv" AND "retrieveMenuItem" to facilitate I/O operations)
        Parameters:
        targetItemID - ID of the existing menu item to be edited.
        editItemName - Name of the existing menu item to be edited.
        editItemType - Type of the existing menu item to be edited. Can only be defined as the following enum values: DRINK, MAIN or DESSERT.
        editItemDescription - Description of the existing menu item to be edited.
        editItemPrice - Price of the existing menu item to be edited.

      • deleteMenuItem

        public void deleteMenuItem(int targetItemID)
        Method to delete an existing item. (uses "writeToCsv" to facilitate I/O operations)
        Parameters:
        targetItemID - ID of the menu item to be deleted.

      • retrieveMenuItem

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable MenuItem retrieveMenuItem(int targetItemID)
        Method returning a MenuItem object that matches the input targetItemID.
        Parameters:
        targetItemID - ID of the menu item object to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        menuItemObj Object containing menu item attributes.

      • retrieveMenuItemListFiltered

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable ArrayList<MenuItem> retrieveMenuItemListFiltered(MenuItem.MenuItemType targetItemType)
        Method returning an ArrayList filtered by one menu item type.
        Parameters:
        targetItemType - type of the menu item objects to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        menuItemsFiltered ArrayList containing the menu item type selected
